Package net.fabricmc.loader.api

Interface ModContainer

public interface ModContainer
Represents a mod.

  • Method Details

    • getMetadata

      ModMetadata getMetadata()
      Returns the metadata of this mod.

    • getRoot

      @Deprecated default Path getRoot()
      Deprecated.
      use getRootPath() instead
      Returns the root directory of the mod.
      Returns:
      the root directory

    • getRootPath

      Path getRootPath()
      Returns the root directory of the mod.

      It may be the root directory of the mod JAR or the folder of the mod.

      Returns:
      the root directory of the mod

    • getPath

      default Path getPath​(String file)
      Gets an NIO reference to a file inside the JAR.

      The path is not guaranteed to exist!

      Parameters:
      file - The location from root, using / as a separator.
      Returns:
      the path to a given file
